thread.title: SUV evading CHP skids off 118 Freeway ramp, hits Granada Hills home
thread.title_full: SUV evading CHP skids off 118 Freeway ramp, hits Granada Hills home - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: SUV evading CHP skids off 118 Freeway ramp, hits Granada Hills home
text: GRANADA HILLS â€” A motorist was injured today when a vehicle crashed into a house in Granada Hills. The crash was reported in the 11300 block of Balboa Boulevard around 2 a.m., the Los Angeles Police Department reported. The motorist was trying to get away from California Highway Patrol officers who were conducting a traffic stop, according to the LAPD. The crash occurred after the speeding SUV exited the nearby Ronald Reagan (118) Freeway, according to NBC4. The motorist, whose name was not immediately released, was taken to a hospital for treatment. Advertisement
